description: The Targus Brilliance II Laptop Backpack offers great design as well as functionality. Built to protect up to 16 inch laptops, this backpack features multiple carrying pockets for all of your essentials and one pocket just for your laptop. The computer fits snugly into the separate padded compartment to provide protection with extra room to carry a few books, a binder and two water bottles in the insulated side pockets. The front pocket features a convenient key clip, business card holders and space for larger accessories like a power adapter or mouse.  Alongside its great functional aspects, this laptop backpack features a padded carry handle, back panel and shoulder straps to support your back while traveling to your next hot spot.
title: Targus Brilliance II Backpack Designed for 16-Inch Laptop - TSB219US (Black/Gray)
